item.title: Ergo Keyboards
item.description: Recently I digged into ergonomical mechanical split keyboards. Links https://kbd.news/, https://golem.hu https://www.reddit.com/r/ErgoMechKeyboards https://jhelvy.shinyapps.io/splitkbcompare https://docs.qmo https://docs.qmk.fm

item.title: What is Hugo
item.description: Hugo is a fast and modern static site generator written in Go, and designed to make website creation fun again.
